title: High Hopes for Addy
description: In High Hopes for Addy, Addy's hopes seems shattered. Her baby sister, Esther, messes up all of her things, including her kite for the kite festival. Then, with Esther's help, Addy discovers just what it takes to make kites fly and dreams soar.After you read Addy's story, learn how to make a kite like the one Addy and her family made.
author: Connie Rose Porter
